PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-03062015-03-12FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActPension Benefits Standards Act, 1985
Pooled Registered Pension Plans Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Relating to Pensions
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS RELATING TO PENSIONS in order to (1) improve the regulatory framework for defined contribution plans; (2) modernize the pension fund investment rules; and (3) enhance disclosure and protect plan members' and former members' pension benefits.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0060 Publication Date: 2015-03-25
